description: The Men’s Sparwood Stripe Crew Sweater looks as good as it feels. Its subtle pattern and contrast stripe detail make it easy to dress up or dress down. Plus, it's made in part with recycled polyester fibers, which helps reduce waste. Whether you're enjoying a night on the town or a relaxing evening on the couch, this sweater will let you feel good in style.
name: Smartwool Sparwood Stripe Crew Sweater - Mens

specs.value: 55% Polyester, 30% Merino Wool, 15% Nylon. Exclusive Of Decoration.
